author: Leila K
title: Two night stay in Paris -
text:
We stayed at the Hotel Mercure Montmartre on 3/25-3/26/2017.
The hotel is very centrally located and close to the metro station.
The rooms are modern and clean and the breakfast buffet was very good.
The Main Street that the hotel is located on is very touristy and has lots of restaurants, but if you venture a couple of streets behind the hotel, you will find many local restaurants, cafes, and shops.
I would highly recommend this hotel.
